name: PolyGold
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: An innovative cryptocurrency investment and yield farming platform built on the Polygon/Matic chain that seeks to create an ecosystem with sustainable, long-term growth.
